name: Plants vs Machines
description:
Compete in a battle of wits to see who wins between nature and machines.

A mix between pong and match 4, in this game both players are competing for the highest score, do this by shooting the ball, and stopping it in the desired location, afterwards the player will change locations and shoot the ball from a different point. Both players start at opposite ends, each representing either the Plants or the Machines.

Download for Windows below.
